name: propers
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
respect that someone deserves: You've got to give them their propers: they sure build a nice golf course.
More examplesFewer examples "I do say propers in the song," said Aretha. "I got it from the Detroit street. It was common street slang in the 1960s."This fall, African-American music gets its propers on TV.
